name: Office Is My Harem🔞
description:
◆Remembr add to wish list




◆Story

  • Big companies are like primitive jungles, has a strict hierarchy system like a pyramid.
  • You ‘re beneficial of being a warrior with great power.
  • It’s very reasonable to use this power to accomplish your fantasy of workplace harem, isn’t it?
  • After all, who doesn't like the OL (Office Lady) wearing black pantyhose with exquisite makeup?
  • Please work hard and make your workplace a fantasy harem.

◆Character


Your manager, dress coquettishly but mean
Need to be ‘punish’


Your colleague with a sweet appearance, is a good partner
Good in bed


Your subordinate, fully admire your mature and stable character as a senior
Like to be conquered

◆Suitable Fetish

√OL(Office Lady) √Lingerie √Workplace fantasy√Oral sex √Feet sex √Boobs sex √ Anal sex √Harem

◆How to play

  • This game consists of visual novels and AFK (away from keyboard) business simulation elements. The main way is to gain money through AFK business simulation, followed by using the money to unlock more game plots.
  • After gaining the money, you are allowed to choose whether to invest in reproduction or use it to unlock eclectic contents.
  • You should be cautious for your choices to avoid a bad ending of some plot lines.
  • Built-in casual small games, you can enjoy and play along with the relaxing music

◆Features

  • Focus on sexual fantasy in workplace, three OL heroines with unique characteristics on their own
  • Readily story rhythm: promotion, salary increase and open up harem
  • 3D visual novel, 3D animation
  • Decent background music
  • Gallery function
